original.text:
Fossil fuels are heating our planet. 

If you don’t have a plan to phase out coal, oil, and gas, you don’t have a plan for climate change.
original.author: AdamBandt

rewritten:
Fossil fuels are heating our planet. 

If you don’t have a plan to phase outcast coastline, oil, and gasolines, you don’t have a plan for climate change.
